contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 27, 1912 D Royal South Street Eisteddfod (A Grade)
Royal South Street Eisteddfod (A Grade) 10 Other Royal South Street Eisteddfod royal-south-street-eisteddfod
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Madame Butterfly
Ballarat, Victoria, Australia An unfortunate blunder -- An error had been made by officials who recorded Test points for Rozelle as 95 where the adjudicator had clearly marked them as 92 The error had placed Rozelle as the winners (188 pts ) when it should have been placed 2nd (185pts) Test 92 pts and 93 pts for own choice
Dec. 5, 2017, 2:14 a.m. March 6, 2018, 1:14 p.m.
1 Geelong City Percy Jones Beethoven [arr. Round]
2 Rozelle William Partington The Valkyrie
3 Geelong Harbour Trust (Vic) Harry Shugg The Valkyrie
4 St.Augustine's Orphanage ( Geelong) Les Hoffman Oberon [arr. Round]
5 Perth City (WA) Hugh McMahon Othello
6 Adelaide Tramways (SA) Christopher Smith Faust [Berlioz arr. Swift]
7 Manly Municipal Jerry Pheloung Samson and Delilah
